question: I need a ride to the airport. Can you book an Uber for me?

toolset.name: book_uber_ride
toolset.input_structure: Requires destination, start_location, ride_type. The user must provide these parameters.
toolset.description: Books an Uber ride based on the user's current location and ride preferences.

destination.description: The desired destination for the ride.

start_location.description: The user's current location or preferred starting point for the ride.

ride_type.description: The type of ride to book (e.g., 'UberX', 'UberXL', 'Comfort').

result.description: The result of the book_uber_ride operation

toolset.name: get_current_location
toolset.input_structure: No input parameters required.
toolset.description: Returns the current geographical location as latitude and longitude.

result.description: The result of the get_current_location operation

toolset.name: login_to_uber
toolset.input_structure: Requires email, password. The user must provide these parameters.
toolset.description: Logs into the Uber app, verifying user credentials and fetching saved payment methods, while considering the user's preferred system currency.

email.description: The email address associated with the Uber account.

password.description: The password for the Uber account.

result.description: The result of the login_to_uber operation

toolset.name: set_location_service_status
toolset.input_structure: Requires on. The user must provide these parameters.
toolset.description: Enables or disables the location service.

on.description: Set to true to enable location services or false to disable them.

result.description: The result of the set_location_service_status operation

toolset.description: Retrieves user-specific information such as username, age, preferences, etc.

toolset.description: Provides a list of applications installed on the system.

toolset.description: Returns the current storage space available on the device.

on.description: Set to true to enable Wi-Fi or false to disable it.

toolset.description: Returns the current status of the Wi-Fi connectivity.

question: I'm planning a dinner for four people tomorrow evening. Can you find a nice place nearby on Resy?

toolset.name: resy_search_restaurants
toolset.input_structure: Requires date, time, number_of_people. The user must provide these parameters.
toolset.description: Searches for available restaurants only available on Resy based on the current location, date, time, and number of people.

date.description: The reservation date in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

time.description: The reservation time in the format HH:MM:SS.

number_of_people.description: The number of people for the reservation.

toolset.description: Returns the current time in a standard format (e.g., HH:MM:SS). Defaults to UTC

toolset.input_structure: Requires on. The user must provide these parameters.

toolset.input_structure: Requires location. The user must provide these parameters.

location.description: The location for which to retrieve weather conditions (e.g., city name, coordinates).

toolset.input_structure: No input parameters required.
toolset.description: Fetches the system's current time zone.

result.description: The result of the get_us_national_holiday operation
